name: My Soul Is Yours
description:
Controls: 
WASD - Move Camera
Left Click - Select Unit
Right Click - Undo Selection

An ART-170 and CMPM-170 Game for the 3rd Game Jam from Collective 26 at UCSC.

Collective 26:
Production Team: Patrick Queiroz, Santiago Ponce

Programming Team: Santiago Ponce, Raymond Metzger, Michelle Kim, Eduardo Alcaraz, Arrian Chi

Art Team: Kaelen Cook, Dalia De La Luz, Jonathan Hung

The kid wandered through the forest, alone and distraught after the invasion. Looking for survivors, food, kinship, water, something… he stumbles upon one of his elders with what looks to be a sad looking book. He walks up, takes the book from the embattled corpse, and peruses its pages. A smile trickles across his face, he can feel the warmth of the book cover him. He feels it touch his body, then his insides, then his soul… and he lets it take over him. Elated, he can feel himself merging with the book, the book inside him, telling him what to do, telling him silly little jokes… The cultists are elated. The book has found its master! All hail the power of the master! The kid is happy, warm and content, for he has finally found a friend. 

Play as Jeff, the young newly appointed Cult Leader, commanding your invading force right into the heart of the Holy Zealot territory. The Zealots are fierce, and much more heavily equipped compared to your group of followers. However those under your guidance will lay down their life, limb, and soul to see this mission through at all costs, creating incredible openings with dire costs...

Such a shame to lose those followers so soon, but nothing a few rounds of hypnotism can't fix.
